page.title: 06FERNIE LODGE RESTAURANT H.B
page.content: The people who own the Fernie Lodge in 1985 are Mr and Mrs Hayes.Most of their customers come from Leicester Coventry and Northampton.They get a lot of customers from big cities like London.They serve 200 people a day during a week.But at the weekends they serve about 300 poeple per day. There are 21 rooms altogether.They serve English food at the restaurant. A 4 course meal costs Â£11.50 Mr and Mrs Speight owned the Fernie Lodge be fore Mr and Mrs Hayes. Previously it was used for a residential home for elderly women and a private club for American service men then a hotel and a public house.The building is 185 years old.Mr and Mrs Hayes came to Husbands Bosworth from Essex to run the Fernie Lodge.They enjoy it here because there is more countryside. They employ 70 people.
